price: (Kandi Allah azi) imvugo ye (Muhamadi) igira iti “Nyagasani wanjye! Mu by’ukuri aba bantu ntibemera!”
arabic: وَقِيلِهِۦ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: waqīlihi yārabbi inna hāulāi qawmun lā yu'minūna
